name: Apprentice Hat
tooltip: A humble wizard's hat.

set_bonus.bonus: +15% of magic barrier is added as magic damage

name: Apprentice Robe
tooltip: A plain robe worn by mages in training.

set_bonus.bonus: +15% of magic barrier is added as magic damage

name: Apprentice Pants
tooltip: Comfortable and breezy pants that aid in focus.

set_bonus.bonus: +15% of magic barrier is added as magic damage

name: Arcane Monk Blindfold
tooltip: The magic energies around you let you see just as clearly as with your eyes.

name: Arcane Monk Cloak
tooltip: A cloak with particular magical patterns woven in.

name: Arcane Monk Leggings
tooltip: Both sturdy and light, these pants won't get in the way while casting spells.

name: Assassin Hood
tooltip: A mysterious hood for true desert dwellers that keeps the face in shade.

set_bonus.bonus: +26.6% melee and range attack speed for a short duration after dodging

name: Assassin Cloak
tooltip: This multi-layered piece of fabric is tightly woven to keep the body cool and protect from coarse, grainy sand.

set_bonus.bonus: +26.6% melee and range attack speed for a short duration after dodging

name: Blast Helmet
tooltip: A heavy capsule that would be airtight if not for the narrow slits of its faceplate.

name: Bronze Helm
tooltip: This helm repels slight blows to the head.

name: Bronze Breastplate
tooltip: A good armor to survive battles more easily.

name: Bronze Pants
tooltip: Some bronze for the shin.

name: Carapace Helm
tooltip: A chitin-plated head piece, wearing it fills you with the urge to dig paths through the darkness.

set_bonus.bonus: +23.8% damage for a short duration after mining a wall

name: Carapace Breastplate
tooltip: An organic body armor resembling Ghorm's shell, it is heavy and feels weird on the inside.

set_bonus.bonus: +23.8% damage for a short duration after mining a wall

name: Caveling Hood
tooltip: Light armor hood that hides the face.

name: Caveling Chest
tooltip: Made from grub leather, good for unhindered movement in combat.

name: Caveling Pants
tooltip: These pants don't cover much but make your movement more elusive.

name: Chieftain Headdress
tooltip: This grand headdress shows clearly who's boss.

name: Chieftain Tunic
tooltip: Made with some of the finest Bambuck wool.

name: Chieftain Shorts
tooltip: Fine shorts with plenty of jewelry, well suited for a leader.

name: Cooking Pot Lid
tooltip: A shiny metal cover that suppresses your boiling point.

name: Cooking Pot Tub
tooltip: Only the ones really passionate about cooking dare to become the pot itself.

name: Copper Helm
tooltip: Resembles more of a bucket but repels strong blows to the head.

name: Copper Breastplate
tooltip: Got no sixpack? Just craft one!

name: Copper Pants
tooltip: Protects the shins with ease.

name: Core Commander Helm
tooltip: The discarded headpiece of a high-rank armor. When worn, you can feel an immense power surging through your mind. It's whispering words you could never understand.

set_bonus.bonus: +25% damage dealt by you and all nearby allies

name: Core Commander Brigandine
tooltip: An astonishing upper body armor that sends pulses of energy through the body. It feels almost forbidden to wear it, brimming with more power than a human body could potentially handle.

set_bonus.bonus: +25% damage dealt by you and all nearby allies

name: Core Commander Greaves
tooltip: Woven from otherworldly cloth in confusing patterns, this armor piece escapes any understanding of earthly craftsmanship.

set_bonus.bonus: +25% damage dealt by you and all nearby allies

name: Corrupt Warden Mask
tooltip: A wooden mask with decorative beads and a distant stare.

name: Corrupt Warden Tunic
tooltip: A simple tunic but with jewelry and fine fabrics layered on top.

name: Corrupt Warden Shorts
tooltip: A pair of shorts, decorated with various bands and jewelry.

name: Cosmos Visor Helm
tooltip: A futuristic helm sealed under a big glass dome, leaving the view open to marvel at the miracles of space.

name: Cosmos Torso
tooltip: This airtight jacket keeps the atmosphere around your body evenly pressured and is equipped with a system to increase damage efficiency.

name: Cosmos Legwear
tooltip: Heavy pants that are less suited for quick movements and more for safely treading on foreign planets.

name: Desert Guardian Mask
tooltip: A mysterious headpiece that resembles some sort of animal.

name: Desert Guardian Tunic
tooltip: A light tunic over a dark, full-body layer underneath. Fitted with golden jewellery.

name: Desert Guardian Pants
tooltip: Some light fabric over a dark, full-body layer. It's rather tight.

name: Diving Helm
tooltip: This heavy chunk of metal was used to explore deep waters, unfortunately it's leaking now. Still works as a nice armor piece.

set_bonus.bonus: +24% of fishing added as range damage

tooltip: An upper body armor made from long kelp strands. Now you feel like a real creature of the sea.

name: Galaxite Helm
tooltip: A futuristic helmet fit for a space explorer. Looking through its visor is like looking into the depths of the universe.

name: Galaxite Torso
tooltip: A futuristic protection for the upper body. Its intimidating yet elegant design is a true marvel to look at.

name: Galaxite Pants
tooltip: A futuristic armor for the lower body. It makes you feel like every small step you take is a giant leap for mankind.

name: Gemstone Garment
tooltip: This noble robe covers the body in a cascading, silk-like fabric. The woven in ancient gemstone enhance spiritual capabilities.

name: Gemstone Harem Pants
tooltip: A set of pants that feels very comfortable to wear. Rooting you in the here and now, you can feel your mental focus increasing.

name: Gingerbread Hood
tooltip: This gingerbread headpiece has not been baked, so it remains flexible to be drawn over the head.

name: Gingerbread Top
tooltip: A tasty breast armor made from gingerbread, comes with sugar buttons and a fondant bowtie.

name: Gingerbread Pants
tooltip: Fairly stiff legs are the main feature of this baked armor, as wells as crumbs bewteen the toes.

name: Godsent King Mask
tooltip: A unique, royal piece of armor resembling the head of the state, crowning it as a descendant of the gods. It was intended for a future that never came.

effects.text: +4% additional chance to trigger Ra-Akar's soul power
+4% additional chance to trigger Ra-Akar's soul power(+0%)
+5% additional chance to trigger Ra-Akar's soul power(+1%)
+5% additional chance to trigger Ra-Akar's soul power(+1%)

name: Godsent King Breast Armor
tooltip: A unique, royal piece of armor resembling the heart of the state. Golden wings were added to inherit the grace of Azeos. Before it could be used, the kingdom crumbled to dust from the inside.

effects.text: +6% additional chance to trigger Azeos' soul power
+6% additional chance to trigger Azeos' soul power(+0%)

+7% additional chance to trigger Azeos' soul power(+1%)

name: Godsent King Pants Armor
tooltip: A unique, royal piece of armor resembling the heir of the state, which was supposed to carry the glory of the kingdom when inheriting the throne. A dark prophecy and act of assassination ended the royal line.

+3% additional chance to trigger Omoroth's soul power(+0%)

name: Grim Hood
tooltip: This opposing hood is sure to strike fear into your opponents.

set_bonus.bonus: Minion damage is increased by +48% of your magic damage increase

name: Grim Breastplate
tooltip: A grand, ominous robe with sharp shoulder pads.

set_bonus.bonus: Minion damage is increased by +48% of your magic damage increase

name: Grim Legwear
tooltip: Despite the sturdy, skeletal frame, you can still move with ease.

set_bonus.bonus: Minion damage is increased by +48% of your magic damage increase

name: Hazmat Helm
tooltip: Need to handle strange materials that emit even stranger radiation? Ask no more!

name: Hazmat Suit Jacket
tooltip: Whatever the problem is, encountering it behind a protective suit makes it a little less stressful.

name: Hazmat Suit Pants
tooltip: A protective suit is not complete without some boots that save the feet.

name: Hivebone Helm
tooltip: A helm crowned with erratic fangs and thorns akin to those on the Hivemother maw.

name: Hivebone Breastplate
tooltip: A fleshy suit covered by protective spines. The feeling on your skin is quite unpleasant.

name: Hivebone Pants
tooltip: Legwear of haphazard pillows of thick hide that wrap around the legs as defensive folds.

name: Hunter Hood
tooltip: This hood is made from big leaves tucked into a headband. Lets you blend into green environments.

set_bonus.bonus: +15% critical hit chance after standing still for a short duration

name: Hunter Cloak
tooltip: A cloak crafted from big leaves woven together. Makes you look like a walking bush.

set_bonus.bonus: +15% critical hit chance after standing still for a short duration

name: Hydra Bone Helm
tooltip: The gruesome-looking empty skull of a hydra. One senses a malevolent presence when putting it on.

set_bonus.bonus: +20% chance on melee hit to increase range damage by 30%

name: Hydra Bone Breastplate
tooltip: The nearly indestructible rib bones of a hydra; they adjust to the chest size of the wearer.

name: Iron Helm
tooltip: Tough helm fit for knights. Comes with a visor and a flamboyant plume.

name: Iron Breastplate
tooltip: Charge into battle with this epic chest piece.

name: Iron Pants
tooltip: You've got knees of steel!

name: Ivy's Thorn Harness
tooltip: This organic breastplate armor is crested with thorns, allowing for stronger critical hits.

set_bonus.bonus: +25% critical hit chance for a short duration after successfully applying poison

name: Ivy's Pants
tooltip: Lower body armor naturally grown in the underground jungle, featuring thorned kneecaps.

set_bonus.bonus: +25% critical hit chance for a short duration after successfully applying poison

name: Larva Helm
tooltip: No need for fancy hats. Just grub.

name: Larva Chest
tooltip: Don't be anything else. Be grub.

name: Lily Pad Hat
tooltip: This lily pad appears unusually sturdy. It fits on your head nicely.

set_bonus.bonus: +30% magic damage while adjacent to water

name: Magma Horn Armor
tooltip: A pretty awesome piece of equipment that makes you look like the harbinger of doom.

name: Magma Torso Armor
tooltip: This fiery armor is almost too hot to handle but becomes well-tempered when worn.

name: Magma Shin Armor
tooltip: A melting leg armor made from liquid stone, giving hot legs a whole new definition.

name: Mercenary Headband
tooltip: The only thing you need to put on when you want to rush through the jungle as a one-man-army...wait, that was something else.

name: Mercenary Tank Top
tooltip: Green and full of sweat this piece of clothing is perfect for emerging from the shadows guns blazing.

name: Mercenary Pants
tooltip: Camouflaged leggings that keep you on your toes around heavily-guarded areas.

name: Miner's Protective Helm
tooltip: A handy helm with integrated goggles and a still functioning headlamp.

set_bonus.bonus: +16% movement speed boost for a short duration after mining a wall

name: Miner's Labour Suit
tooltip: An airtight zip-up suit for working in deep caverns. The flashy orange makes it official.

set_bonus.bonus: +16% movement speed boost for a short duration after mining a wall

name: Miner's Worker Pants
tooltip: Well-fitting pants that make traversing the underground much more convenient. Comes with squeaky rubber boots.

set_bonus.bonus: +16% movement speed boost for a short duration after mining a wall

name: Moldweb Helm
tooltip: A head-piece covered in living mold. Its pulse enhances your bodily functions.

name: Moldweb Breastplate
tooltip: A chest-piece covered in living mold, hungering for big prey.

name: Moldweb Pants
tooltip: Legwear covered in living mold. It seems uninterested in feeding on the wearer.

name: Ninja Cowl
tooltip: Hidden by the dark.

name: Ninja Garments
tooltip: Moving swiftly as the wind.

name: Ninja Leggings
tooltip: Gone without a sound.

name: Octarine Helm
tooltip: A strange headgear with no visor. For some reason you can still see clearly when putting it on.

set_bonus.bonus: Attack speed is increased by 0.2% for every percentage of missing health

name: Octarine Breastplate
tooltip: This mysterious breastplate stimulates the muscles to swing your weapon much faster.

set_bonus.bonus: Attack speed is increased by 0.2% for every percentage of missing health

name: Octarine Pants
tooltip: This peculiar leg protection phases energy through your whole body.

set_bonus.bonus: Attack speed is increased by 0.2% for every percentage of missing health

name: Omoroth's Helm
tooltip: An iron-cast helm with a scary grimace and potruding tentacles.

name: Omoroth's Chestplate
tooltip: A upper body armor reminiscent of the Sea Titan. There is a sleek cape attached to it.

name: Omoroth's Leg Armor
tooltip: Delicately decorated leg protection that's constantly wet. Looks cool but is very uncomfortable to wear.

name: Paladin Mask
tooltip: A mysterious piece of equipment with a golden mask. It seems to have been granted to warriors of high rank.

name: Paladin Harness
tooltip: A golden breastplate with loose fabric sewn to it that makes you feel like a stealthy warrior of the desert.

name: Paladin Pants
tooltip: Wide harem pants made for fighting, coupled with a set of pointy golden shoes.

name: Pandorium Helm
tooltip: Glistening and twisted. When worn, you feel attuned to all possible outcomes.

set_bonus.bonus: +80% melee damage while not having taken any direct damage for a while

name: Pandorium Chestplate and Bracers
tooltip: These plates feel inexplicably connected to your entire nervous system. When worn, your muscles twitch with anticipation.

set_bonus.bonus: +80% melee damage while not having taken any direct damage for a while

name: Pandorium Pants
tooltip: Light and breathable leg armor. When worn, you can sense the smallest tremors beneath your feet.

set_bonus.bonus: +80% melee damage while not having taken any direct damage for a while

name: Peasant Hat
tooltip: Simple leather hat, doesn't look that great but does its job.

name: Peasant Chest
tooltip: A simple makeshift armor for the upper body.

name: Pot Lid
tooltip: A heavy clay cover that has partially cracked and doubles down as a funny hat.

name: Pot Tub
tooltip: This brittle clay container is just your size and usually filled with caveling supplies.

name: Rain Coat
tooltip: Sticky things slide right off from this glossy elastic coat. The bright yellow is just a nice touch.

name: Ranger Tunic
tooltip: A light tunic with a quiver allowing for swift archery.

name: Ranger Pants
tooltip: These sturdy leather pants tighten your stance and grant you steady aim for your target.

name: Makeshift Goggles
tooltip: Monocular night vision made from various scientific gadgetry.

name: Researcher's Coat
tooltip: A specialized lab coat faintly tinged with radiation. It's probably harmless.

tooltip: A masterfully crafted upper body armor to endure the dangers of the desert.

tooltip: A lower body armor mimicking the properties of desert critters.

name: Scarlet Helm
tooltip: Menacing-looking horned helm, fits perfectly with the rest of the set.

set_bonus.bonus: Killing an enemy increases critical hit chance by 3%, stacks up to 5 times

name: Scarlet Breastplate
tooltip: Fierce upper body armor for true warriors.

set_bonus.bonus: Killing an enemy increases critical hit chance by 3%, stacks up to 5 times

name: Scarlet Pants
tooltip: March through your enemies and don't look back.

set_bonus.bonus: Killing an enemy increases critical hit chance by 3%, stacks up to 5 times

name: Scholar's Hood
tooltip: A strange hood made from white linen and gold, in its shade you feel more intelligent than usual.

name: Scholar's Cloak
tooltip: A magically-imbued piece of cloth, worn by caveling scholars. Wearing it you feel in tune with the ancients.

name: Slime Helm
tooltip: A gooey, constantly dripping helm that covers half of your face.

name: Slime Armor
tooltip: A gelatinous upper body armor that looks like someone dumped a bucket of goo onto you.

name: Soaring Headgear
tooltip: A stylish hat and scarf, fit for one another.

name: Soaring Poncho
tooltip: Comfy and lightweight, this poncho flows well as you run.

name: Soaring Pants
tooltip: Comes equipped with winged boots that should aid your mobility.

name: Solarite Barbute
tooltip: A nearly indestructible helm forged with patience and precision. When it is worn, you feel energized, lively and protected.

name: Solarite Cuirass
tooltip: A crystalline piece of equipment that shields the upper body like a fortress. The bright material evokes old memories of the sun.

name: Solarite Tassets
tooltip: Heavy hip protection made from miraculous materials. When it is worn, you feel guided along a path to victory.

name: Sorcerer Hood
tooltip: A hood worn by Initiated mages.

set_bonus.bonus: Up to +26% magic damage based on your remaining mana

name: Sorcerer Robe
tooltip: A robust robe, using magic fused into the fabric to withstand attacks.

set_bonus.bonus: Up to +26% magic damage based on your remaining mana

name: Sorcerer Pants
tooltip: Sturdy pants with plenty of pockets for magical trinkets.

set_bonus.bonus: Up to +26% magic damage based on your remaining mana

name: Spooky Blanket Hood
tooltip: A cheap last-minute attempt to get ready for the spooky season.

name: Spooky Blanket Cape
tooltip: Boohooo, behold the dirty bedding!

name: Stone Chestplate
tooltip: A cumbersome but sturdy armor piece of finely chiselled stone.

name: Stone Pants
tooltip: Bulky legwear sculpted from solid rock. The best way to train the calves.

name: Sulfossil Helmet
tooltip: Like a crown, when worn, you assert yourself dominant over the forces within this sulfuric mass.

name: Sulfossil Cuirass
tooltip: This volatile mass latches its plating onto your body. It feels ready to retaliate.

name: Sulfossil Boots
tooltip: The gel padding adds a bounce to your step. Suprisingly quiet for the force contained within.

name: Tassel Earrings
tooltip: A pair of earrings, each with an elegant tassel decoration.

set_bonus.bonus: +15% chance on hit to kill any target that has lower health than you

name: Tassel Top
tooltip: A top featuring tassels along the bottom.

set_bonus.bonus: +15% chance on hit to kill any target that has lower health than you

name: Tassel Skirt
tooltip: A fine skirt with multiple decorative tassels.

set_bonus.bonus: +15% chance on hit to kill any target that has lower health than you

name: Wildwarden Mask
tooltip: A wooden mask with decorative leaves and horns attuned to the wildlife.

set_bonus.bonus: +15% health when a pet is equipped

name: Wildwarden Pauldrons
tooltip: This wooden chest-piece is wrapped in a bundle of mysteriously unwithering leaves.

set_bonus.bonus: +15% health when a pet is equipped

name: Wildwarden Pants
tooltip: Leafy legwear made from ancient wooden roots that seem to connect with the earth whenever one stands still.

set_bonus.bonus: +15% health when a pet is equipped

effects.text: +19% critical hit damage for your pet
+21% critical hit damage for your pet(+2%)

+27% critical hit damage for your pet(+8%)
+29% critical hit damage for your pet(+10%)
+30% critical hit damage for your pet(+11%)
+31% critical hit damage for your pet(+12%)

name: Witch Doctor Hat
tooltip: A rustic top hat with various trinkets along the brim.

name: Witch Doctor Vest
tooltip: A worn vest with a simple shirt underneath.

name: Witch Doctor Jeans
tooltip: A pair of jeans with a golden chain strapped on.

name: Wood Helm
tooltip: Slight protection for the head but you should look for better options soon.

name: Wood Chest
tooltip: Very crude armor for the upper body. Offers minor protection.

name: Wood Pants
tooltip: The next best thing when it comes to lower body armor.

name: Adventurer's Hat
tooltip: Looks familiar.

name: Atlantean Worm Helmet
tooltip: A fierce looking helm that resembles the head of the Atlantean Worm. How it came to be is a mystery.

name: Blue Bikini Bottom
tooltip: A blue underwear piece that goes well with its top part. Get rid of unnecessary clothing and run free in the sun!

name: Blue Bikini Top
tooltip: A blue swim suit piece that keeps everything in its place. Everyone knows the most revealing armor is the most protective.

name: Blue Board Shorts
tooltip: Wearing those chill blue shorts tempts you to constantly form the shaka sign with your hand.

name: Cupid Tunic
tooltip: When wearing this tunic, one feels as if they have been sent from the heavens to spread love.

set_bonus.bonus: +100% longer duration of applied charm effects

name: Dracularva Cape
tooltip: A black satin cape fit for a vampire. The crimson flip-up collar adds to the evil look.

name: Farmer's Hat
tooltip: Tuck a straw in your mouth and get ready for a whole day of relaxing on the porch.

name: Festive Hat
tooltip: A warm, soft hat to keep ones ears warm in the cold season. You can't get around wearing one of those in winter.

name: Frankenbrute Head
tooltip: Put more head on your head. Doesn't necessarily add up to more brain, though.

name: Gingerbreadman Head
tooltip: A funny headpiece made from gingerbread. Just ignore the creepy smile and soulless eyes.

name: Green Bikini Bottom
tooltip: A green underwear piece that goes well with its top part. Get rid of unnecessary clothing and run free in the sun!

name: Green Bikini Top
tooltip: A green swim suit piece that keeps everything in its place. Everyone knows the most revealing armor is the most protective.

name: Green Board Shorts
tooltip: Wearing those chill green shorts tempts you to constantly form the shaka sign with your hand.

name: King Slime Crown
tooltip: A rare headpiece that crowns you as king of all slimes. You feel very royal wearing it.

set_bonus.bonus: You are the king of slimes

name: Plague Mask
tooltip: An eerie beaked mask. Its inside reeks of rancid death, yet lets you live to smell it.

name: Pumpkin Head
tooltip: A fruit head with a carved-in face. For how disgusting it feels from the inside, it looks pretty cool on the outside.

name: Radical Rabbit Ears
tooltip: A cute hood featuring white rabbit ears. You feel quite cheeky and swift wearing it.

name: Radical Rabbit Headband
tooltip: A cute headband featuring white rabbit ears. You feel quite cheeky and swift wearing it.

name: Red Bikini Bottom
tooltip: A red underwear piece that goes well with its top part. Get rid of unnecessary clothing and run free in the sun!

name: Red Bikini Top
tooltip: A red swim suit piece that keeps everything in its place. Everyone knows the most revealing armor is the most protective.

name: Red Board Shorts
tooltip: Wearing those chill red shorts tempts you to constantly form the shaka sign with your hand.

name: Sentry Helm
tooltip: The detached head of a core sentry. Wearing it feels incredibly clunky and heavy but it makes up for it with great protection.

name: Shaman Skull
tooltip: A skull covered in ritualistic markings. Its burning eye sockets ignite a fiery fury in you.

name: Shrooman Cap
tooltip: It grows on your head. You can feel your wounds growing shut along with it.

name: Skirmisher Cap
tooltip: A headpiece worn by caveling skirmishers which has been cobbled together with larvaskin, leaves and dirty cloth.

name: Snowman Hat
tooltip: Whatever one is feeling at the moment, this hat covers it all up with a happy expression made from coal and carrots.

name: Sunglasses
tooltip: Nothing is more important than sporting cool sunglasses, even when it's dark.

name: Towel
tooltip: A towel is about the most massively useful thing an underground miner can have.

name: Trenchcoat
tooltip: A coat with deep pockets fit for a hoggish, dodgy fancier.
